text: 1.10 1 Ko 15.54-57, Kol 1.26, Hib 2.14, 1 Pi 1.20 Pen mɨñɨl Klays Jisas, bɨ kasɨn gep chɨn ak, mɨseŋ lup. Ne apɨl gek, God yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gep ne ak abe mɨseŋ lup. Kumɨl tek yobɨnop ak pen, Klays Jisas kumeb adek ak tɨg jɨsɨpuk gɨ dɨyokak. Takaw teplep ne dad apɨl chɨnop gek, chɨn nopun, pɨsnep kumɨl ma kul gɨnɨgun, pel pelnep yonɨgun tek lup.
